title: Better Wine Enjoyment
brief_description: Better Wine Enjoyment By the Experts, takes the viewer to Australia’s most famous vineyards, as well as some of the smaller wineries, seeking out the secrets of good wine from the winemakers themselves. Presented by Collin Segelov, it starts with the history of winemaking in Australia and then moves to the art of growing the fruit and making the wine. Once in a bottle, it proceeds to teach the viewer how to taste, choose, drink and
